title: Parmigiano-Reggiano DOP 24 Months
description: Authentic Italian Parmigiano-Reggiano aged for 24 months. Hard, granular texture with a rich, nutty flavor and crystalline crunch.

title: Aged Gouda Holland
description: Premium Dutch Gouda aged for 18 months. Sweet, caramelized flavor with crunchy calcium lactate crystals.

title: Roquefort AOP Blue Cheese
description: Traditional French blue cheese made from sheep's milk. Creamy texture with a sharp, tangy flavor and distinctive blue veining.

title: Prosciutto di Parma DOP
description: Italian dry-cured ham aged for 18 months. Delicate, sweet flavor with a silky texture that melts on the tongue.

title: Tagliatelle all'Uovo
description: Fresh egg pasta ribbons from Emilia-Romagna. Made with semolina flour and farm-fresh eggs for authentic Italian taste.

title: Paccheri Artisanal Pasta
description: Large tube pasta perfect for hearty sauces. Bronze-die extruded for perfect sauce adhesion and al dente texture.

title: Orecchiette Pugliesi
description: Traditional ear-shaped pasta from Puglia. Hand-rolled using durum wheat semolina for authentic texture and flavor.

title: Arborio Rice Superfino
description: Premium Italian short-grain rice perfect for risotto. High starch content creates the ideal creamy consistency.

title: Tipo 00 Flour Caputo
description: Finely milled Italian flour perfect for pizza and bread making. Soft texture with excellent gluten development.

title: Barolo DOCG 2018
description: Noble Nebbiolo wine from Piedmont. Full-bodied with complex tannins, notes of cherry, rose, and tar. Perfect with red meat.

title: Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
description: Traditional Tuscan wine made from Sangiovese grapes. Elegant with cherry flavors, balanced acidity, and smooth tannins.

title: Champagne Vintage Dom PÃ©rignon
description: Prestigious French champagne with fine bubbles. Complex aromas of white fruits, brioche, and mineral notes.

title: Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
description: Premium Tuscan wine made from 100% Sangiovese. Aged 5 years with intense flavors of dark fruits and spices.

title: Grappa di Barolo
description: Premium Italian grape brandy distilled from Nebbiolo grape pomace. Smooth with floral and fruity notes.

title: Tuscan Extra Virgin Olive Oil DOP
description: Cold-pressed olive oil from Tuscan hills. Fruity aroma with peppery finish and notes of artichoke and almond.

title: Balsamic Vinegar of Modena DOP
description: Traditional aged balsamic vinegar from Modena. Thick, syrupy consistency with complex sweet and tangy flavors.

title: Truffle Honey
description: Artisanal honey infused with black truffle pieces. Perfect for cheese boards and gourmet dishes.

title: Dijon Mustard Traditional
description: Authentic French Dijon mustard made with white wine. Sharp, clean flavor perfect for vinaigrettes and marinades.

title: Harissa Paste North African
description: Spicy North African chili paste with roasted peppers, garlic, and aromatic spices. Perfect for marinades and sauces.

title: Ethiopian Single Origin Coffee
description: Light roast coffee beans from Yirgacheffe region. Bright acidity with floral notes and citrus undertones.

title: Earl Grey Premium Tea
description: Classic English breakfast tea blend with bergamot oil. Full-bodied with citrusy aroma and smooth finish.

title: Matcha Green Tea Ceremonial Grade
description: Premium Japanese matcha powder made from shade-grown tea leaves. Vibrant green color with umami flavor.

title: Chamomile Herbal Tea
description: Organic chamomile flowers for a soothing herbal tea. Naturally caffeine-free with honey-like sweetness.

title: Marcona Almonds Spanish
description: Premium Spanish Marcona almonds, blanched and roasted. Buttery flavor and delicate crunch, perfect for snacking.

title: Organic Dried Figs
description: Natural sun-dried figs from Turkey. Sweet, chewy texture with intense fig flavor. No added sugars or preservatives.

title: Sea Salt Flakes Maldon
description: Premium pyramid-shaped sea salt flakes from Essex, England. Pure, clean taste perfect for finishing dishes.

title: Wild Flower Honey Raw
description: Unprocessed wildflower honey with complex floral notes. Rich golden color and naturally crystallized texture.
